services using Laravel.Design and implement secure, scalable, and high-performance APIs.Manage and optimize Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI), including compute, databases, networking, and security.Implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment.Monitor and troubleshoot server performance, databases, and cloud resources.Ensure high availability and security of applications and cloud environments.Collaborate with frontend developers, DevOps engineers, and product teams to deliver high-quality software.Preferred: Knowledge and experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS).Requirements (Must-Have):✅ 5+ years of backend development experience with Laravel – This is mandatory.✅ Deep expertise in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) – This is mandatory.✅ Strong knowledge of DevOps practices (CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, automation).✅ Experience with MySQL, PostgreSQL, or Oracle Databases.✅ Knowledge of Linux server administration and cloud security best practices.✅ Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.✅ Preferred: Experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS).🚨 Important Notes:❌ If you do not have backend development experience with Laravel, please do not apply.❌ If you do not have deep knowledge of Oracle OCI, please do not apply.We value your time and ours.🚨 ملاحظات هامة:❌ إذا لم تكن لديك خبرة في تطوير الأنظمة الخلفية باستخدام Laravel،
